{"id":1588468126,"question_id":3657,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1743101082,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"202 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1588468126/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Grid can be Cut into Sections","memory":"245 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkValidCuts(int n, vector<vector<int>>& rectangles) {\n        vector<pair<int, int>> xs, ys;\n        for (auto i : rectangles) {\n            xs.push_back({i[0], 1});\n            xs.push_back({i[2], -1});\n            ys.push_back({i[1], 1});\n            ys.push_back({i[3], -1});\n        }\n\n        auto ok = [](vector<pair<int, int>>& pts) {\n            sort(pts.begin(), pts.end());\n            int count = 0, ans = -1;\n            for (auto i : pts) {\n                count += i.second;\n                if (!count)\n                    ans++;\n            }\n            return (ans >= 2);\n        };\n        return ok(xs) || ok(ys);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-grid-can-be-cut-into-sections","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1083}
